channel.title: Claws are nulled on web-client but not on client! *help me!*
channel.description:
hello guys, i have a problem that i kinda need to fix.
My d claws work on my client but show up as nulled on my webclient.
Here's some pics:
Here's what my client looks like:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/clientlogin.gif[/img]
Here's what my web client looks like:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/rspsorg.gif[/img]
Here's me wielding them on my client:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/clawswield.gif[/img]
Here's them in my client inventory:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/clawsinv.gif[/img]
Here's them in my webclient inventory (as u can see they r null):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/clawsnulled.gif[/img]
is there anyway to make them 'not null' on my webclient? if so - how??

item.title: Claws are nulled on web-client but not on client! *help me!*
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“mrpopyman, post:4, topic:385117”][quote author=mikeyboy09 link=topic=480882.msg3520992#msg3520992 date=1299400045]
Is it YOUR webclient or one of those webclients that people do for you -.-

  • Mikey
    [/quote]

mikey it’s one that you can get from rs-ps(dot)org

Use the same client?

No, i want people who use the webclient to be able to use d claws[/quote]

Then turn your desktop client into a webclient.

Read full topic
item.source: Claws are nulled on web-client but not on client! *help me!*

item.title: Claws are nulled on web-client but not on client! *help me!*
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

MAKE IT YOUR OWN WEBCLIENT!!
Then it won’t be nulled anymore

Read full topic

hello guys, i have a problem that i kinda need to fix.
